title: Belmont Gardens Remodeled 2 Bedroom on Tripp
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Belmont Garden!   2 bedroom no utilities included. Wood floors, laundry in the unit, dishwasher, remodeled kitchen & bath, etc. Walking distance to CTA bus on Belmont and Pulaski, grocery stores, restaurants, shops, and more. Ac in the unit.   $65 Application fee. No security deposit!  For more details & a showing please call Saida 1-773-407-6452. www.hunterprop.com   Hunter Properties office 1-773-477-7070   Sample pictures!
